flawed_nl_solution:
At a germination rate of 3/5, 25 seeds will yield 3/5*25=<<3/5*25=15>>15 plants.
At a germination rate of 4/5, 25 seeds will yield 4/5*25=<<4/5*25=125/4>>125/4 plants.
In total, she will have grown 15+125/4=<<15+125/4=185/4>>185/4 plants.
If 4/5 of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown (4/5)*185/4=<<(4/5)*185/4=37>>37 plants that produce flowers.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 125/4. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
